verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H3212><s%>, Go again <S%H157><s%>, love a woman <S%H802><s%> beloved <S%H157><s%> of her friend <S%H7453><s%>, and an adulteress <S%H5003><s%>, even as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> loveth <S%H160><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, though they turn <S%H6437><s%> unto other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%>, and love <S%H157><s%> cakes <S%H809><s%> of raisins <S%H6025><s%>.

So I bought <S%H3739><s%> her to me for fifteen <S%H6240><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%>, and a homer <S%H2563><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%>, and a half-homer <S%H3963><s%> of barley <S%H8184><s%>;

and I said <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H3427><s%>, Thou shalt abide for me many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>; thou shalt not play the harlot <S%H2181><s%>, and thou shalt not be <S%H1961><s%> any man <S%H376><s%>'s wife: so will I also be toward thee.

For the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> shall abide <S%H3427><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> without king <S%H4428><s%>, and without prince <S%H8269><s%>, and without sacrifice <S%H2077><s%>, and without pillar <S%H4676><s%>, and without ephod <S%H646><s%> or teraphim <S%H8655><s%>:

afterward <S%H310><s%> shall the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> return <S%H7725><s%>, and seek <S%H1245><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> their God <S%H430><s%>, and David <S%H1732><s%> their king <S%H4428><s%>, and shall come with fear <S%H6342><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> and to his goodness <S%H2898><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.
